tool_description: Executes click actions on web elements with support for different click types, coordinates, and modifier keys.

element_selector.description: CSS selector or XPath for target element

click_type.description: Type of click: left, right, double, middle

wait_before_click.description: Wait time in seconds before executing click

scroll_into_view.description: Scroll element into view before clicking

error_messages: Invalid session: Session ID does not exist or has expired
Element not found: Could not locate element using the provided selector
Element not clickable: Element is not in an interactable state
Invalid click type: Use one of [left, right, double, middle]
Click execution failed: Unable to execute click action on the element
usage: Provide session_id and element_selector, optionally specify click_type and timing parameters. The tool executes the click and returns action status.

click_successful.description: Whether the click action was executed successfully

element_found.description: Whether the target element was found

execution_time.description: Time taken to execute the click action in seconds
